title: Kenyan Medics Issue Strike Notice to Governors, Health Ministry Over Payment Agreements
description: The Kenya Union of Clinical Officers (KUCO) has issued a 21-day strike notice over delayed CBAs, unpaid arrears, and unfulfilled labour agreements.
content:
• KUCO said the Ministry of Health failed to sign a concluded national CBA despite agreeing to timelines
  • KUCO also accused county governments of breaching a July 2025 agreement by faili… [+4495 chars]
source: Breaking NEWS in KENYA for Today Right Now & Kenyan News | TUKO
